Key Match Events: Kieffer Moore scored a goal inside 38 seconds
Harry Wilson scored an improvised goal from about 25 yards less than two minutes later
Driton Camaj scored a goal from close range
Post-Match Reflections: Craig Bellamy enjoyed his first win as Wales manager
The match was played in difficult conditions due to heavy rain and a poor pitch
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was originally scheduled to be played in Podgorica but was moved to Niksic due to concerns over the pitch
Others: The match was part of the Nations League, a competition that replaced international friendlies
